title: Consider the Purpose of the Visualization
text: The scale should help the audience understand the data accurately.

title: Avoid Misleading Scales
text: A scale that exaggerates or minimizes differences can mislead the audience.

title: Focus on Data Representation
text: The scale should represent the data as it is, without distortion.

title: Consider the Audience's Understanding
text: The audience should be able to interpret the data correctly with the chosen scale.

hintAnswer: Ensure the scale accurately represents the data
title: Select the Correct Scale
text: Ensure the scale accurately represents the data.
choices: Use a scale that exaggerates differences
Ensure the scale accurately represents the data
Choose a scale that minimizes differences
Select a scale that fits the slide size
